lines.speaker: Villain
text: LOOK WHO'S BACK!!! THE PATHETIC, WORTHLESS, UNLOVABLE WASTE OF SPACE!

lines.speaker: Villain
text: HA-HA-HA! Nothing to say, as usual. Well, don't worry. I'll do the talking for you.
"Boo-hoo! My wife died, and I was too weak to save her! Now I'm a pathetic, worthless, unlovable waste of space!"

lines.speaker: Villain
text: And so, wallowing in self-pity, you come crawling back to me. Pathetic --

lines.speaker: Hero
text: -- worthless, unlovable waste of space, yeah, I get it. Can we just get this over with?
